20101225050627.000|20101225050627.000|CC1|   INCLUDING FUNGAL INFECTIONS  
20101225050627.000|20101225050630.000|CC1|         AND HEPATITIS B.

20101225050631.000|20101225050631.000|CC1| WHERE CERTAIN FUNGAL INFECTIONS

20101225055837.000|20101225055840.000|CC1|    and leaks, day and night.   
20101225055840.000|20101225055840.000|CC1|       If you have certain      
20101225055840.000|20101225055843.000|CC1|  stomach or glaucoma problems, 
20101225055843.000|20101225055843.000|CC1|       or trouble emptying      
20101225055843.000|20101225055844.000|CC1|          your bladder,

20101225055846.000|20101225055847.000|CC1|       allergic reactions       
20101225055847.000|20101225055849.000|CC1|      that may be serious.      
20101225055849.000|20101225055849.000|CC1|   If you experience swelling   
20101225055849.000|20101225055850.000|CC1|       of the face, lips,       
20101225055850.000|20101225055850.000|CC1|  throat or tongue, stop taking 
20101225055850.000|20101225055854.000|CC1|VESIcare and get emergency help.
20101225055854.000|20101225055855.000|CC1|   Tell your doctor right away  
20101225055855.000|20101225055855.000|CC1|       if you have severe

20101225055859.000|20101225055901.000|CC1|         blurred vision,

20101225055904.000|20101225055906.000|CC1|    dry mouth, constipation,    
20101225055906.000|20101225055908.000|CC1|        and indigestion.
